overview: According to Mr. Julio Pena, quartermaster of the Chapultepec Palace: "One day I came into the room where the prisoners had been kept and noticed a fair-sized chuck of the new carpeting has been removed...bloodstains...no other prisoners were being held there. I assumed this was where President and Vice President of the Republic has been assassinated." English Subtitles
title: Héroes anónimos II
